e9f9d868-94b1-43b4-818d-85226691ef97.description: Earners of this credential have successfully passed the Sightline training module that provides an overview of Sightline’s proposition, looking into the core areas that make up the offering and how it solves key client challenges. Sightline is Group's advanced end-to-end programmatic DOOH solutions and technology suite, born from the combined innovation of Xaxis and Kinetic – GroupM’s programmatic and outdoor specialists. Delivering digitally integrated OOH for brands.
e9f9d868-94b1-43b4-818d-85226691ef97.name: Sightline Certified - Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: A successful completion of the Sightline training module with a passing score of 80%.

ef19bf4f-ef9a-42c0-bd25-eecbe49b37bd.description: Earners of this credential have put their knowledge of Copilot to the test, ranging from the basics to specific strategies.

75ac9416-63eb-4053-94ce-55eedd6aaac2.description: Earners of this credential have an understanding of artificial intelligence, how it’s used in advertising, and the fundamental aspects of Copilot

57c6602b-48c3-433b-8653-c1b4bd22c5c9.description: Earners of this credential have completed the Xaxis Introduction to Gaming Media course, which takes you through a general overview of the gaming industry, gives you an understanding how to advertise within the complex space of gaming and explore potential new audiences to target within the gaming ecosystem while learning about Xaxis Gaming Media ad formats.
57c6602b-48c3-433b-8653-c1b4bd22c5c9.name: Gaming Media Fundamentals 1

badge_template_activities.title: 60minute eLearning course. Successfully pass Introduction to Gaming Media Quiz.

3d9c36a4-5b62-4ddd-ba48-baa884ab6ee7.description: Eaners of this credential have completed the Unconscious Bias course on Xaxis IQ. In this module, you will have learnt about unconscious biases, why we have them, and what some of the more common biases are and steps you can take to recognise and minimise.
3d9c36a4-5b62-4ddd-ba48-baa884ab6ee7.name: Unconscious Bias

badge_template_activities.title: Course completion

7ce3c5e8-6ff5-41b9-a8cf-c930f4ad11ec.description: Earners of this credential have completed the Digital Fundamentals Pathway. 40ba67a6-ba10-4a3a-8495-f7d6252841c7.description: Earners of this credential have successfully completed the Xaxis How to Sell Gaming Media course which takes you through Xaxis Gaming Media benefits, client personas and a deep dive into the relationship between gaming and the metaverse. Earners also successfully passed a final quiz, demonstrating an understanding of how the benefits of Xaxis Gaming Media can be used to engage with different client personas.
40ba67a6-ba10-4a3a-8495-f7d6252841c7.name: Gaming Media Fundamentals 2

badge_template_activities.title: 60 minute online eLearning course. Successfully pass How to Sell Gaming Media Quiz

1ce8b5fa-1175-416b-8cd4-e0b164d3888d.description: Earners of this credential have completed the Programmatic Strategist Pathway, which will equip you with the basics to co-create programmatic strategies with internal teams, agencies and clients using biddable media channels, strategic data and advertising technology, focusing on the skills needed to collaborate and communicate effectively as a Xaxis Programmatic Strategist.

93a69951-dd7a-405d-afe6-f1cf7fcbbcfb.description: Eaners of this credential have completed key training on the #BreakTheBias pathway, which seeks to imagine a gender equal world. A world free of bias, stereotypes, and discrimination.

b263a564-397d-413e-be58-81ffd59fb15f.description: Earners of this credential are members of our Global Case Study Battle winning team for 2020, with their case study 'Boosting holiday bookings with dynamic creative', from Denmark. The team have beaten off strong competition from their fellow 2020 regional winners to win the prestigious annual award, and become the benchmark. The GCSB is our internal competition to surface the best work from our programmatic professionals around the world, with winners being chosen by our senior judging panel.
b263a564-397d-413e-be58-81ffd59fb15f.name: DRAFT: Global Case Study Battle Winner 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Click here to view the winning case study - Boosting holiday bookings with dynamic creative. Xaxis were tasked by Landal Greenparks, in Denmark, to increase off-season occupancy of their holiday parks. This case study was chosen as the global winner because the team showcased their ability to deliver real-life outcomes by increasing occupancy by 50%. Doing so by innovatively utilizing real-time data to influence delivery, whilst utilizing dynamic creative to effectively target each customer.
